content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


-- Examine the data types for the columns and number of columns
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'



--Check max length of columns data types
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationId)) AS Len_locationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS Len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS Len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS Len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]



--Use with clause to provide explicit data types and define data types
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        location_Id SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]



-- Examine the data types for the columns
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]'



--Determine Database collation
SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases


--Specify UTF8 collation for single or multiple columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]

--Specify UTF8 collation for a database
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8


--Assign your column names (Changing the column names to lower case)
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationId SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]




--Specify where data row starts
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        --HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]





--Conversion error in data types...change to PARSER_VERSION = 1.0
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        --FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]




--Create External Data Source (hyphens not allowed in names)
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/'
)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        --HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]



CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://mudiasynapsedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/'
)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        --HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        locationID SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]


SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources
